title: Objectives > Kills
body:
Objectives are more important than kills.

Even people in plat can't even get this in their heads.

replies.body:
TBH most of the server doesn't understand this.

soloQ is pretty meh, you either stomp or get stomped.

no one has any sort of teamwork, only selfish.

most will rage at you if you suggest something, despite if it has anything to do with them or not.

Team ranked is where its at, yet no-one wants to play.

Normals has try hards, yet ranked has people who don't give a fuck.

OCE is dying. 
OCE is boring
OCE has so much boost the ladder doesn't make sense.


**OCE Needs to change**
But objectives dont improve your kda, why take that free baron when you can chase the last guy half way across the map for another kill

No, no, why adc and ap chase a last support from their inhibitor to our t3 for 1 kill and then let their team take baron after that and win the game. Because they want 300 gold from a kill more than 300 gold from baron or 2 t4. Wow what good thinking.{{champion:35}}

> [{quoted}](name=darkdraagoon,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=MvX17PWh,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-30T08:53:13.660+0000)
>
>~~ No, no, why adc and ap chase a last support from their inhibitor to our t3 for 1 kill and then let their team take baron after that and win the game. Because they want 300 gold from a kill more than 300 gold from baron or 2 t4. Wow what good thinking.~~{{champion:35}}

 ur rly smart

KDA won't help you climb ladder but objectives will eventually lead to you winning the game because the whole objective of the game is to team up and get enemy nexus. Also kills don't worth as much as a turret because it gives global gold and denies enemy vision. Other than that Baron buffs and dragon buffs give you and your teammates a huge advantage against your enemies which of course is important to win the game. Objectives are easily worth more gold than a kill because it grants gold to all your teammates which increases the gold advantage of your team for buying items to become stronger.
Unless you are Mordekaiser, in which case getting a kill (especially on a tank or marksman) almost ensures you an unguarded turret, even without winions! :D

The sad thing about this post, there are people in bronze, that are willing to give up a penta kill for an attempt for an objective (they even failed the objective because i was annoying and nidalee.)

It's sad when you find this playing on a B4 account but not elsewhere on the ladder.

Kills is to set up for getting objectives because your objective in the whole game is to get the enemy Nexus and nothing else. One more thing focus on CS and not on kills please because 18CS is = 1 kill.
but muh objective is to kill
*Unless you can get a Hexakill in ranked (and a couple assists to go with it). That'd be probably worth more than mid turret.
